results.title: Prisoner Cell Block H – The Musical program
results.brief_description: Prisoner packed a punch when it premiered in 1979. Set in the fictional suburb of Wentworth, the female-centred prison drama reverberated around the world, spawning international adaptations and a massive cult following.
results.title_for_label: Prisoner Cell Block H – The Musical program

results.title: Magic lantern set effects slide (Blind man's bluff)
results.brief_description: Wooden, handpainted magic lantern set effects slide with two slipping slides. The slide depicts a boy wearing a blindfold, when the slide is pulled left and right, girls move around him.
results.title_for_label: Magic lantern set effects slide (Blind man’s bluff)
